Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Rogue[/b] | Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
[b]Warrior[/b] | Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
